name: Sleep Optimization Protocol
description: Comprehensive evidence-based sleep optimization combining environment, behavior, timing, and optional supplementation. Sleep is the foundation of all longevity — poor sleep accelerates every aging pathway. Based on Matthew Walker's research and Andrew Huberman's protocols.
mechanisms: Glymphatic clearance (brain waste removal during sleep)

dosage.standard: 7-9 hours with consistent timing, cool dark room
dosage.notes: Temperature: 65-68°F (18-20°C). Dark: blackout curtains. Timing: consistent wake time ±30min. Light: morning sunlight within 30min of waking. No screens 1hr before bed. Supplements if needed: Mg glycinate, L-theanine, apigenin.

keyFindings: Sleeping <6hr doubles cardiovascular disease and cancer risk
Glymphatic system clears amyloid beta 10x more during sleep
Consistent sleep schedule more important than total sleep duration
